text: Stephan Leyhe (; born 5 January 1992) is a German ski jumper.http://www.fis- ski.com/ski-jumping/athletes/athlete=leyhe-stephan-117450/ He made his World Cup debut in December 2014 in Engelberg, and has one individual win to date, as well as a third place overall finish at the 2018–19 Four Hills Tournament. ==Record== ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- " !Event !style="width:70px;"|Normal hill !style="width:70px;"|Large hill !style="width:70px;"|Team |- | align=left |2018 | – | – | bgcolor=silver|Silver |} ===World Championship=== {| class="wikitable" "text-align:center;" ! Year ! Normal hill ! Large hill ! Team LH !
